member.name: T:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions
member.summary: Contains static methods for retrieving custom attributes.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttribute``1(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified assembly.
member.returns: A custom attribute that matches , or null if no such attribute is found.
member.typeparam: The type of attribute to search for.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttribute(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Type)
member.summary: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified assembly.
member.returns: A custom attribute that matches , or null if no such attribute is found.
member.param: The type of attribute to search for.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttribute``1(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Retrieves a custom attribute of a specified type that is applied to a specified member, and optionally inspects the ancestors of that member.
member.returns: A custom attribute that matches , or null if no such attribute is found.
member.param: true to inspect the ancestors of ; otherwise, false.
member.typeparam: The type of attribute to search for.

true to inspect the ancestors of ; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.GetCustomAttributes``1(System.Reflection.Assembly)
member.summary: Retrieves a collection of custom attributes of a specified type that are applied to a specified assembly.
member.returns: A collection of the custom attributes that are applied to and that match , or an empty collection if no such attributes exist.
member.typeparam: The type of attribute to search for.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.IsDefined(System.Reflection.Assembly,System.Type)
member.summary: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified assembly.
member.returns: true if an attribute of the specified type is applied to ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The type of the attribute to search for.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.IsDefined(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Type)
member.summary: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified member.
member.returns: true if an attribute of the specified type is applied to ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The type of attribute to search for.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.IsDefined(System.Reflection.MemberInfo,System.Type,System.Boolean)
member.summary: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified member, and, optionally, applied to its ancestors.
member.returns: true if an attribute of the specified type is applied to ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The type of the attribute to search for.
true to inspect the ancestors of ; otherwise, false.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.IsDefined(System.Reflection.Module,System.Type)
member.summary: Indicates whether custom attributes of a specified type are applied to a specified module.
member.returns: true if an attribute of the specified type is applied to ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The type of attribute to search for.

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.IsDefined(System.Reflection.ParameterInfo,System.Type)

member.name: M:System.Reflection.CustomAttributeExtensions.IsDefined(System.Reflection.ParameterInfo,System.Type,System.Boolean)

member.returns: true if an attribute of the specified type is applied to ; otherwise, false.
member.param: The type of attribute to search for.
true to inspect the ancestors of ; otherwise, false.

member.name: T:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping
member.summary: Retrieves the mapping of an interface into the actual methods on a class that implements that interface.

member.name: F:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.InterfaceMethods
member.summary: Shows the methods that are defined on the interface.

member.name: F:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.InterfaceType
member.summary: Shows the type that represents the interface.

member.name: F:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.TargetMethods
member.summary: Shows the methods that implement the interface.

member.name: F:System.Reflection.InterfaceMapping.TargetType
member.summary: Represents the type that was used to create the interface mapping.
